item.description:
Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth do some truly outstanding work. This month, we'll show their film:

Solving the Mystery of Building 7 is a short video about WTC 7 and the questions about its collapse, narrated by Ed Asner. This should be suitable for showing to a lot of people that might not listen to you otherwise. After all, this is "Lou Grant" telling you that it had to be an inside job!

We'll also watch the trailer for Explosive Evidence, which will be released in November.

We welcome other suggestions for viewing this month.

====

Be sure to bring snacks and a box of tea, or your favorite beverage to re-stock our gracious host's snack supply.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the meeting room in the back.
item.name: Concord - Solving the Mystery of Building 7
